name: Dungeon Delvers vol 1
description:
★ ★ ★ This coloring book is digital only. ★ ★ ★

In lands of mighty dragons, hidden paths, and darkest dungeons, men and women hear the call to adventures that promise treasures and whisper secrets. Dungeon Delvers offers 20 ready-to-color portraits of a mixed bag of these potential protagonists, suitable for a coloring party or even quick tabletop RPG portraits for your next dice-rolling session! It also includes two bonus images of cute pixies.

★ 20 portraits by Klawzie
★ +2 bonus images
★ PDF format
★ Print on your favorite paper!
★ Experiment with different background techniques!
★ Some areas are small. Fine-point coloring materials are recommended for more detailed areas.

---

★ Terms of use:
These images are intended for personal (non-commercial) use only.
Please do not use as web graphics. (You may use your colored version as your character portrait on a roleplaying site or share your colored image if you give credit to me!)
You may print out copies (ex: to bring to a coloring party or convention one-shot), but please do not share the PDF or uncolored digital image.
You may use the images as part of a personal journal or a gift for a friend, but you are not allowed to sell the image in any way.

★ Issues:
If you have any issues, please let me know and I'll do my best to help you out!

★ Contact:
Feel free to contact me to let me know if you'd like to see a Volume 2, which images were your favorite, or your favorite coloring book themes!
